OUTLINE : This open-label , pilot study . Patients receive oral gefitinib daily 4 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Within 3 day completion gefitinib , patient undergo restaging evaluation . Patients whose disease still consider resectable proceed surgery . Patients undergo thoracotomy lobectomy pneumonectomy OR sleeve resection . Patients also undergo mediastinal lymph node dissection . After surgical resection , treatment gefitinib may continue study discretion principal investigator . After completion study therapy , patient follow 30 day , every 4 month 1 year , every 6 month 1 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 50 patient accrue study within 12.5 month .
